children.name: Football, the most played and most watched sport on earth originated in China

It's easier to smile than frown.
Astronauts can grow up to two inches taller in space.
When listening to music, your heartbeat will sync with the rhythm.
Gravity changes how much the person weighs on a planet.
Standing the majority of the day has been said to increase concentration

Your brain is more powerful, more complex and more clever than any computer ever built
The first actual computer “bug” was a dead moth which was stuck in a computer.
The first computer of the world, the ENIAC, weighed around 27 tonnes and occupied an entire hall
Only about 10% of the world’s currency is physical money, the rest only exists on computers
